title: Surat Video Viral As ‘People Gathering Near Mosque in Delhi’
subtitle: Crowd in Delhi Viral Video Fact Check: Akali Dal leader Manjinder Sirsa on 29 April shared a video showing a large number of people gathering near a mosque, violating lockdown rules with a claim that it’s from Delhi’s Daryaganj area.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Shiromani Akali Dal (SAD) leader Manjinder Sirsa on 29 April shared a video showing a large number of people gathering near a mosque and violating lockdown rules with a claim that it’s from Delhi’s Daryaganj area.

Tagging Delhi Chief Minister Kejriwal, he took a jibe at the AAP leader and said that by allowing a huge gathering like the one seen in the video, he is risking the lives of all Delhi's citizens.
